name: CreaoFileUpload
description: The CREAO Official File Upload API enables secure transmission and storage of diverse file types, laying a robust foundation for building multi-modal applications. All uploaded files—whether images, audio, video, documents, or other media formats—are encrypted and persistently stored in CREAO's dedicated cloud storage bucket, adhering to industry-standard security protocols. This seamless support for varied data modalities empowers developers to effortlessly integrate rich, multi-format content into applications, unlocking possibilities for creating dynamic multi-modal experiences.
